title: Van der Poel, Vingegaard, Pidcock, Jorgenson: Who’s Racing Where, and Why it Matters
content:
Peloton VIPs push the accelerator on their road to monuments, Giro d'Italia, Tour de France next week at Paris-Nice and Tirreno-Adriatico.

Read the full article at Van der Poel, Vingegaard, Pidcock, Jorgenson: Who’s Racing Where, and Why it Matters on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
